file_content.text:
CORUSCANT SECURITY ALERT
Criminal gang "The Fondor Five" confirmed active in Old Galactic Market sector. Last seen entering Fartrader Lounge. All five gang members carry death sentences and substantial bounties from numerous violent felony convictions.
Bounty payment to be rendered contingent upon substantive proof of gang members' final status.
CITIZENS STRONGLY DISCOURAGED FROM PURSUING BOUNTY - SUSPECTS CONSIDERED ARMED AND EXTREMELY DANGEROUS!
